casebody.data:
JACKSON
v.
CENTURY MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY 337A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 29, 2017 Tony S. Botros, Attorney at Law, for Jackson, Thomas, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Century Mutual Insurance Company.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Plaintiffs to Amend Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of November 2017."
